Title: Snailspiration: Scooter the Snail
Description:
I smell a snail on you, but it's strange. You holding out on me?

Not many people know this, but snails are incredibly susceptible to peer pressure. Show off that wonder-snail you got there, and let's get Slick inspired.
ObjectivesText: Summon a max-level Scooter the Snail battle pet and show it to Briggul.

Objectives.Text: Max level Scooter the Snail shown to Briggul
